= Installation =

* Simply copy the font files to /usr/share/fonts
* Run:
```bash
sudo fc-cache -fv
```


= Previewing Fonts =

* Since ttf files are just images, this can work
{{{bash
display *.ttf
}}}


== [[file:~/.scripts/system/rofi-font-preview|User Made Script that uses rofi]] ==
 
=== [[./explainations/font-preview-script.wiki|Script Explaination]] === 
 
{{{bash
choice=$(fc-list | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/://g' | rofi -dmenu -l 20 -p 'Fonts: ')

display "$choice"
}}}
